comment.author: 72329388@N00
comment._content:
Really interesting presentation and fascinating artwork... I only wished I could touch it and examine the numerous drawings more closely. 
- amy (1stFan)

comment.author: 51486262@N07
comment._content:
Thanks for your kind words, Amy.
I was happy to have the opportunity to hang the accordion book in the gallery just to see what it would look like. I was happy with the results, but I do agree that it does deny a closer examination. 
-Keith
